attributes.action: Nationalise private hospitals and care providers for the Covid crisis.
attributes.additional_details: All private healthcare resources should be readily available to respond immediately to the crisis.
attributes.background: To ease the pressure on the NHS. Spain has done this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304482

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
